text: 2. Rice needs 2x more work per hectare than wheat This has influenced the cultures of rice vs wheat people 1. With more food, rice areas had 2x the population density 2. Neighbors had to collaborate much more in tending to each other's fields These lead to collaboration

text: Gemini CLI is superior to figuring out complex bugs, and WAY faster. It speedruns through the repo in 10x the time it takes Claude to walk through. I ask Gemini to explain only since it's edit tools are crap, the copy all text and paste it into a fresh claude session to fix.
